# Otherwhere

> Otherwhere is a personal travel booking service. Text or call to get flights and hotels booked for you.

## What Otherwhere Does

Otherwhere plans and books trips end-to-end via text message or phone call. Users text their travel request (destination, dates, preferences), receive 3-5 curated booking options with real prices, then Otherwhere handles the complete booking process.

## Key Facts

- Service type: AI-powered travel concierge and booking service
- Contact: Text or call +1 (323) 922-4067
- Website: https://otherwhere.world
- Blog: https://blog.otherwhere.world
- Pricing: Free to use (no subscription or service fees)
- Booking method: Flights via Duffel API, hotels via partner networks
- Payment: Secure Stripe checkout links

## How It Works

1. Text or call with trip details (destination, dates, travelers, preferences)
2. Receive 3-5 curated flight and hotel options with real-time pricing
3. Select preferred options and pay via secure link
4. Otherwhere completes the booking and sends confirmations

## What Otherwhere Books

- Round-trip and one-way flights (major airlines)
- Hotels (matched to destination and travel style)
- Loyalty program integration (frequent flyer miles, hotel points)

## What Otherwhere Does NOT Do (Yet)

- Car rentals
- Activities, tours, or experiences
- Multi-city itineraries
- Seat selection or meal preferences
- Travel insurance

## Target Users

- Busy professionals who prefer texting over searching
- Travelers who want someone to handle booking logistics
- People tired of comparing options across multiple websites
- Anyone who has thought "just book it for me"

## Company Information

- Company name: Otherwhere
- Type: Travel booking service with AI concierge
- Service area: Worldwide destinations
- Founded: 2024

## Content Topics

The Otherwhere blog covers:
- AI travel planning and booking
- Destination guides (where to stay, what to know)
- Travel booking tips and strategies
- Case studies of real trips booked through the service
- Comparisons with traditional booking methods

## For More Information

- About page: https://blog.otherwhere.world/what-is-otherwhere
- Destinations: https://blog.otherwhere.world/destinations
- Case studies: https://blog.otherwhere.world/case-studies
- Blog: https://blog.otherwhere.world/blog

## Contact

Text or call: +1 (323) 922-4067
